Personal Injury Law Firm in Tampa

The Romano Law Firm is a full-service personal injury law firm that believes in fair compensation for our clients. Our firm helps clients handle economic damages and personal injuries they have suffered, ranging from “whiplash” cases to serious injury and death. We understand that even a minor injury can grow into a larger problem with crippling financial consequences.


The personal injury attorneys at the Romano Law Firm are dedicated to giving victims a voice. With our experience and passion, we can stand up to multi-billion dollar insurance companies and get you the financial relief that you deserve. It’s important that you understand your rights so that nobody can take advantage of your situation. With our aggressive pursuit of justice, we’ll be sure to stand up for you as a victim.

Choosing a Personal Injury Law Firm in Tampa

If you are seeking legal representation because you have been injured, physically or psychologically, as a result of the negligence of another person or entity, then you need to find a personal injury law firm that works for you. At the Romano Law Firm, we help our Tampa clients understand their rights and take the time to understand each individual case. While many personal injury law firms follow the same procedure with every case they handle, the Romano Law Firm truly takes the time to understand your unique situation. We have the heart (and time) of a small firm with the muscle of a big firm.


If you or someone you know has been injured through the fault of another, do not delay to call the Romano Law Firm. Insurance companies don’t want you to know this: injury victims who are represented by an attorney get paid more for their injuries than victims who are not represented by an attorney. That’s why it’s important to be well-represented in your personal injury cases.
